description: This file defines a set of functions for managing a mock course catalog, including listing categories and courses, retrieving course details, tracking progress, and marking modules as complete, with data stored in localStorage.

methods.name: loadCompletion
methods.description: Loads the course completion map from localStorage, returning an object mapping course IDs to module completion status.

methods.name: saveCompletion
methods.description: Saves the course completion map to localStorage.
